channel.title: [PI] Drops/Drop Rates
channel.description:
Hey guys, I know this is posted A LOT, but even after searching, I haven't found what I need.
Okay, so I was testing how to change drops/drop rates. So for my test, I used my Tormented Demons. Here's the code I used:
[code] #torm demon 1155:100 15027:100 [/code]
15027 is dragon claws. From what I've read, this SHOULD make it drop 100 dragon claws, 100% of the time. Well, I saved it, compiled, then ran my server. It doesn't drop anything.
Am I doing something wrong?

item.title: [PI] Drops/Drop Rates
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

Hey guys, I know this is posted A LOT, but even after searching, I haven’t found what I need.

Okay, so I was testing how to change drops/drop rates. So for my test, I used my Tormented Demons. Here’s the code I used:

#torm demon
1155:100	15027:100

15027 is dragon claws. From what I’ve read, this SHOULD make it drop 100 dragon claws, 100% of the time. Well, I saved it, compiled, then ran my server. It doesn’t drop anything.

Am I doing something wrong?

Read full topic
